title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration API endpoint
Submit valid user details including username, email, and password
Check the response status code is 201 Created
Verify the user record is created in the database

title: User Registration with Invalid Data
description: Verify that registration fails with invalid or missing required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration API endpoint
Submit incomplete or invalid user data (e.g. missing password or malformed email)
Check the response status code is 400 Bad Request
Verify that no user is created in the system

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully and receives a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login API endpoint
Submit valid registered username/email and correct password
Check the response status code is 200 OK
Verify the response contains a valid JWT token

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when user provides wrong username or password and returns 401 Unauthorized.

steps.description: Navigate to the login API endpoint
Submit incorrect username/email or password
Check the response status code is 401 Unauthorized

title: Token Refresh Success
description: Verify that a valid JWT refresh token returns a new active token.

steps.description: Send a request to the token refresh endpoint with a valid refresh token
Check the response status code is 200 OK
Verify the response contains a new JWT access token

title: Token Refresh Failure with Invalid Token
description: Verify that refresh with invalid or expired token is rejected.

steps.description: Send a request to the token refresh endpoint with an invalid or expired token
Check the response status code is 401 Unauthorized

title: Message Verification Success Normal Flow
description: Verify that submitting a valid SMS message and sender header returns a successful fraud probability prediction within latency targets.

steps.description: Authenticate as a registered user
Submit a valid SMS message text and sender header to the verification API
Check the response status code is 200 OK
Verify the response contains fraud probability score and explanation
Ensure total API response time is less than 500 milliseconds

title: Message Verification Header Spoofing Detection
description: Test verification service detects header spoofing and flags the message as potentially fraudulent.

steps.description: Submit an SMS message with a spoofed sender header known to be fraudulent
Verify fraud probability score is high indicating likely fraud
Verify header authentication section indicates spoofing detection

title: Message Verification with Urgency Manipulation
description: Test that messages with manipulated urgency keywords embedded are flagged appropriately.

steps.description: Submit an SMS containing urgency manipulation keywords as per RBI compliance rules
Verify compliance check flags the message and increases fraud score
Response includes actionable recommendation to user

title: Message Verification Under High Throughput
description: Verify system can handle 10,000+ requests per second while maintaining latency requirements.

steps.description: Simulate 10,000+ concurrent verification requests
Ensure all responses are received with latency less than 500ms
Verify no significant error or rate limiting response that impacts normal flow

title: Rate Limiting on Verification API
description: Verify that the verification service enforces rate limiting and returns 429 when exceeded.

steps.description: Send rapid verification requests exceeding the configured rate limit for one user
Check for 429 Too Many Requests response from API

title: Verification API Unauthorized Access
description: Verify that the verification history endpoint requires JWT authentication and rejects unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Attempt to access verification history endpoint without JWT token
Ensure response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: User Reporting of Suspicious Message Success
description: Verify that logged in users can submit suspicious message reports successfully and the reports are saved.

steps.description: Login as a user with valid JWT token
Submit a suspicious message report through the reports API
Check response status code is 201 Created
Verify report is retrievable and stored correctly

title: User Reporting Unauthorized Failure
description: Verify access to report submission is unauthorized without a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Submit a report request without authentication headers
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: ML Prediction API Accuracy Verification
description: Verify the ML prediction API returns consistent fraud probability results consistent with model performance criteria (precision >95%, recall >90%).

steps.description: Submit a batch of diverse known test messages with labeled ground truth
Calculate precision, recall, and F1 score from prediction results matching validation criteria

title: Health Check Endpoint Liveness
description: Verify the health API endpoint returns 200 OK indicating service is live.

steps.description: Send a GET request to the /health endpoint
Response status is 200 OK

title: Readiness Check Endpoint
description: Verify the readiness endpoint returns 200 OK when backend dependencies are ready.

steps.description: Send a GET request to the /ready endpoint
Response status is 200 OK indicating readiness

title: Security: JWT Enforcement on Protected APIs
description: Verify protected endpoints reject requests without valid JWT and accept requests with valid tokens.

steps.description: Attempt access to a protected endpoint like /api/v1/verify/history without JWT token
Response is 401 Unauthorized
Attempt access same endpoint with valid JWT token
Response is 200 OK

title: Dashboard Displays Fraud Trends and Educational Content
description: Verify the user dashboard loads and displays fraud patterns, educational materials, and recent trends.

steps.description: Login to the application and navigate to the dashboard
Verify common fraud patterns are displayed
Verify recent fraud trends and educational guidance are visible

title: Monitoring System Metrics Availability
description: Verify that system monitoring endpoints provide metrics on latency, throughput, model performance, and error rates.

steps.description: Access monitoring endpoints or dashboard
Verify metrics for request latency, model prediction drift, and system throughput are available and updated

title: Data Encryption and GDPR Compliance Validation
description: Validate that sensitive user data is encrypted at rest and in transit, and user data access complies with GDPR requirements.

steps.description: Inspect data storage and transmission to ensure encryption protocols are enforced
Confirm system enforces data access controls and logging for GDPR compliance

title: System High Availability and Graceful Degradation
description: Test that the system maintains 99.9% uptime and gracefully degrades when partial service failures occur.

steps.description: Simulate partial service failure such as ML service downtime or database unavailability
Verify other components remain available and system returns meaningful error or degraded results without crashing
Monitor uptime metrics for sustained availability better than 99.9%

title: Feedback Submission to Improve Model
description: Verify users can submit feedback on verification results and that it is accepted by the ML feedback API.

steps.description: Authenticate and submit feedback data to ML feedback API
Check response status is 200 Accepted
Verify feedback is logged and visible in feedback statistics
